doctor_utters: How may I help you today?
Do you have sore throat, runny nose, or nasal congestion?
Do you have difficulty breathing or wheezing?
Have you been exposed to any animals or birds recently?
Have you been in contact with people with similar symptoms in the past 2 weeks?
Do you have a history of asthma or allergies?
Have you been exposed to any environmental irritants such as smoke or dust?
Have you been coughing up any mucus or phlegm?
patient_utters: Yes, I have a sore throat and nasal congestion.
